original_text: Moses spoke to the heads of the tribes of the people of Israel, saying, “This is what the Lord has commanded.
korean_text: 모세가 이스라엘 자손 지파의 수령들에게 말하여 이르되 여호와의 명령이 이러하니라

sentences.original_text: Moses spoke to the heads of the tribes of the people of Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 모세가 이스라엘 백성의 지파 우두리들에게 말했습니다.

sentences.original_text: “This is what the Lord has commanded.
